Framework for ZEUS Common ntuple based analyses

TMiniNtupleCreator

This program is used to create so called Minintuples from common ntuples being stored on dCache. User can select desirable variables to be stored.

TMiniNtupleAnalyzer

This program is used to analyze minintuples obtain in the previous step. Histograms from each sample are stored into separate file.
